Milos Vasic, Software engineer

Highly-skilled software engineer bringing years in software design, development, and integration. Advanced knowledge of Android, React Native and Flutter. Main programming languages: Java, Kotlin, Dart, TypeScript and C++. Experienced in the full project life cycle from design to implementation to integration.

  • Date of birth: 25.07.1985. (Belgrade, Serbia)
  • E-Mail: i@mvasic.ru
  • Mobile: +381 69 25 35 718 (Serbia), +7 966 323 77 17 (Russian Federation)
  • Locations: Belgrade (Serbia), Dubna (Russian Federation)
  • Language: Serbian, English, Russian.
  • Source code and Open-Source: GitHub, GitFlic
  • Telegram: milos85vasic
  • Networks: Linkedin, TenChat, Xing, VK
  • Some of Open-Souce work: Mail Server Factory, Android Toolkit, HelixTrack

Education

  • M.Sc: Contemporary Information Technologies, 2014. University Singidunum, Belgrade (Serbia)
